nodes.text: TK-338 was a human First Order stormtrooper present at the Battle of Takodana during the early stages of the First Order/Resistance War. Another stormtrooper reported to TK-338 that the targets, consisting of Han Solo, Chewbacca, and Finn, were in custody. Just afterward, the Resistance arrived in T-70 X-wing starfighters and freed the prisoners from their watch.
The voice of the stormtrooper referring to TK-338 was that of Fred Tatasciore.
